en.label: Calendar of Shaymia (The Azure Realms)
en.description: The standard calendar of Shaymia, featuring twelve 32-day months. Used throughout the Azure Realms setting in TTRPG campaigns.

months.name: Co-Za
months.description: The first month of spring, first of the year, a time of renewal and growth. Named for the coza flowers that bloom during this season.

months.name: New-Za
months.description: The second month of spring, second of the year, known for its vibrant colors and fresh beginnings. Named for the newza trees that blossom during this time.

months.name: Ru-Za
months.description: The third month of spring, third of the year, a time of rejuvenation and hope. Named for the ruza flowers that symbolize new life.

months.name: Fa-Sol
months.description: The first month of summer, fourth of the year, characterized by warmth and brightness. Named for the fasol trees that thrive in the summer sun.

months.name: Fey-Sol
months.description: The second month of summer, fifth of the year, known for its lush greenery and vibrant life. Named for the feysol flowers that bloom during this time.

months.name: Mon-Sol
months.description: The third month of summer, sixth of the year, a time of abundance and joy. Named for the monsol trees that bear fruit in the summer.

months.name: Fe-Dus
months.description: The first month of fall, seventh of the year, marking the transition to cooler weather. Named for the fedus flowers that change color in autumn.

months.name: Ka-Dus
months.description: The second month of fall, eighth of the year, known for its golden hues and the harvest season. Named for the kadus trees that bear fruit during this time.

months.name: Ma-Dus
months.description: The third month of fall, ninth of the year, a time of reflection and preparation for winter. Named for the madus trees that prepare for the cold months ahead.

months.name: Ka-Dawn
months.description: The first month of winter, tenth of the year, marking the onset of cold weather and snow. Named for the kadawn flowers that bloom in the frost.

months.name: O-Dawn
months.description: The second month of winter, eleventh of the year, known for its harsh conditions and long nights. Named for the odawn trees that endure the cold.

months.name: No-Dawn
months.description: The third month of winter, twelfth of the year, a time of endurance and survival. Named for the nodawn trees that thrive in the harshest conditions.

weekdays.name: Sunday
weekdays.description: First day of the week, often a day of rest and reflection.

weekdays.name: Monday
weekdays.description: Second day of the week, typically a day to start new tasks and projects.

weekdays.name: Tuesday
weekdays.description: Third day of the week, often a day for meetings and planning.

weekdays.name: Wednesday
weekdays.description: Fourth day of the week, a common day for midweek reviews and adjustments.

weekdays.name: Thursday
weekdays.description: Fifth day of the week, often a day for finalizing tasks before the weekend.

weekdays.name: Friday
weekdays.description: Sixth day of the week, typically a day for wrapping up work and preparing for the weekend.

weekdays.name: Saturday
weekdays.description: Seventh day of the week, often a day for leisure and family time.

weekdays.name: Freeday
weekdays.description: Free day of the week, a day for rest and personal activities.

seasons.name: Winter
seasons.description: The harsh cold season in the northern hemisphere.

seasons.name: Spring
seasons.description: The season of renewal as Urra's blessing returns life to the land.

seasons.name: Summer
seasons.description: The bright season of growth and adventure across northern Shaymia.

seasons.name: Autumn
seasons.description: The harvest season when communities prepare for winter's approach.
